name: Cache-Cache
description:
Hi there!
Cache-Cache is a co-op puzzle game for two, played on two screens.

Explore a 3D diorama together
Interact with playful digital toys
Find 7 hidden characters

We hope you'll enjoy it!

===

Cache-Cache is a student game made at the CNAM-ENJMIN, Angoulême, France. It requires a computer with two screens put back-to-back and two mice to be played. We know that a lot of people can't have that kind of setup and thus can't play the game, but if you are able to play it feel free to give us some feedback!

===

The game is made by:

Thomas Chastagnol: Sound designer -  @TChastagnol
Charlotte de Brabant: UI/UX designer
Hugo Dunas-Wald: Game designer - @alterisateur
Constance Gautier: Manager - @ConstanceGau
Rémi Le Gallo - Le Manach: Artist - @heskhwis
Séverin Michaut: Programmer
Horace Ribout: Programmer
